response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your needs exceptionally well. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. For this opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $7,500. I understand that the true value of this product may vary based on your specific requirements, but I am confident that this price presents a great value for what you will receive. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
